metadata.title: Hydrographic Data from the Bering Sea

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries
Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)

metadata.description:
The data base contains hydrographic profiles of the Gulf of Alaska, Bering Sea, Chukchi Sea, and Southeast Coastal Fjords.   Profiles include salinity, temperature, sigma-t, delta-o, depth and occasionally oxygen, nutrient, chlorophyll, and productivity
data.
